name: CQ.tree.TreeGridSorter
doc: Provides sorting of nodes in a CQ.tree.TreeGrid.  The TreeGridSorter automatically monitors event...

configs.name: caseSensitive
configs.doc: true for case-sensitive sort (defaults to false)

configs.name: dir
configs.doc: The direction to sort ("asc" or "desc," case-insensitive, defaults to "asc")

configs.name: folderSort
configs.doc: True to sort leaf nodes under non-leaf nodes (defaults to false)

configs.name: leafAttr
configs.doc: The attribute used to determine leaf nodes when folderSort = true (defaults to "leaf")

configs.name: property
configs.doc: The named attribute on the node to sort by (defaults to "text"). Note that this property is only ...

configs.name: sortAscText
configs.doc: The text displayed in the 'Sort Ascending' menu item (defaults to 'Sort Ascending')

configs.name: sortClasses
configs.doc: The CSS classes applied to a header when it is sorted. (defaults to ['sort-asc', 'sort-desc'])

configs.name: sortDescText
configs.doc: The text displayed in the 'Sort Descending' menu item (defaults to 'Sort Descending')

configs.name: sortType
configs.doc: A custom "casting" function used to convert node values before sorting. The function will be call...
